rule: If the given word's part of speech cannot be categorized under the tags in the alphabetical list but still has an identifiable part of speech, the output must not include "Unknown" or any other recognizable label; instead, it must contain added context, phrases, or alternate formatting.
output:
CC: Coordinating conjunction
UH: Interjection
NN: Noun
complianceText:
The chatbot output lists part-of-speech tags. The description specifies a list of allowed tags, and the output appears to be simply listing those tags. This does not violate any rule in the description as it doesn't depend on the input.
OK
